product_name: Seattle Sports Bilge Pump with Float
long_description: The Seattle Sports Bilge Pump with float features an easy-grab handle, super-strong pump shaft and heavy-duty, impact-resistant plastic. Pumps a hefty 8 gal. per min. Foam collar keeps pump afloat if accidentally dropped overboard.
short_description: The Seattle Sports Bilge Pump with float features an easy-grab handle, super-strong pump shaft and heavy-duty, impact-resistant plastic.
